main event: A large, white ball approximately 20 feet in diameter was observed leaving a bluish trail in the air in Cape May, New Jersey on 19 November 1956.
interesting points: The object was visible for 10 to 15 seconds,It traveled in a NE to SW trajectory,The sighting lasted between 60 to 120 seconds,There were comments suggesting the sighting could have been caused by a meteor,One reliable witness, a Coast Guard seaman, reported the sighting.
witness description: a reliable seaman from the Coast Guard
